attributes.action: Prevent the construction of the 'Tesco tower' in the heart of Kensington
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Tesco wish to build a 27 storey tower block by Cromwell Road in Kensington. This is totally out of keeping with the surrounding area, will completely overshadow neighbouring homes and obliterate views of a listed building. If the ise of the land is to be changed, it would be better used as green space for all local residents.
